sections.heading: body; sale, conveyance, lease, or agreement; how made
sections.text: Any sale, conveyance, lease, or agreement provided for in section 18-2138 may be made by a public body without appraisal, public notice, advertisement, or public bidding.SourceLaws 1951, c. 224, ยง 17(2), p. 819;R.R.S.1943, ยง 14-1639;R.R.S.1943, ยง
